original_text: Art thou better than populous No, that was situate among the rivers, that had the waters round about it, whose rampart was the sea, and her wall was from the sea?
korean_text: 네가 어찌 노아몬보다 낫겠느냐 그는 강들 사이에 있으므로 물이 둘렸으니 바다가 성루가 되었고 바다가 방어벽이 되었으며

sentences.original_text: Art thou better than populous No
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 사람이 많은 나옥보다 더 낫냐

sentences.original_text: that was situate among the rivers
that had waters round about it
and her wall was from the sea
